snippet: The Penguins, trailing the Bruins by 3-0, have played more than 215 minutes in the Eastern Conference finals, but the next lead they take will be their first.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins, trailing the Boston Bruins by 3-0 in Eastern Conference finals, have played more than 215 minutes in the Eastern Conference finals, but the next lead they take will be their first.
lead_paragraph: The Penguins, trailing the Bruins by 3-0, have played more than 215 minutes in the Eastern Conference finals, but the next lead they take will be their first.

headline.seo: Penguins Struggle to Score vs. Bruins, Putting Them on Brink
headline.main: Attack That Carried Pittsburgh This Far Threatens to Sink It
headline.print_headline: The Penguins’ Attack Is Hurting Only Itself
